mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT BLD_CD , BLD_NM FROM TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ /*T:월조직*/ WHERE 1=1 AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND BASE_YM = #{registYearMonth} AND BIZ_SPPT_PRTNR_NO = #{session.employeeIDNumber} ORDER BY BLD_CD
SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{aplcDt}),'YYYYMM')||LPAD(NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(CLINR_RGNO,7,4)),0)+1,4,'0') FROM TB_CBCL_CLINR_BAS WHERE RCP_YM LIKE SUBSTR(#{aplcDt},1,6)||'%'

SELECT CLINR_RGNO , RCP_YM , BLD_CD , APLC_DT , APLCNS_NM , CLINR_FXN_AMT , TAX_DDCTAM , LTRIM(TO_CHAR(CLINR_FXN_AMT - TAX_DDCTAM), '999,999,999') AS DSB_AMT , CLINR_NM , WRK_STRTDT , WRK_ENDDT , BRYY_MMDD , RRNO_ENCR , LOCARA_TNO , EXNO_ENCR , IDV_TNO , ZIP , BAS_ADR , DTL_ADR , BNK_CD , ACNO_ENCR , IDF_APN_FILE_ID , BNKB_APN_FILE_ID , CNTRW_APN_FILE_ID , CNTR_LRORE_APN_FILE_ID FROM TB_CBCL_CLINR_BAS WHERE CLINR_RGNO = #{clinrRgno} AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N'
SELECT IDF_APN_FILE_ID , BNKB_APN_FILE_ID , CNTRW_APN_FILE_ID , CNTR_LRORE_APN_FILE_ID FROM TB_CBCL_CLINR_BAS WHERE CLINR_RGNO = #{clinrRgno}
